attributes.action: Extend the Brexit deadline given the current Covid 19 challenges.
attributes.additional_details: Pass a law to extend the Brexit deadline.
attributes.background: Ensuring we don’t leave the EU without a deal is critical. Our economy has already been severely damaged by the current crisis. A further blow from a no deal Brexit would impact the lives of all our citizens for decades. The deadline to leave should be extended to allow for proper negotiations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300412
